title: Powerade Zero
text: POWERADE ZERO STRAWBERRY SMASH has zero sugar and includes the taste of deliciously ripe, sweet strawberry flavors. It takes more grind to dominate, so stock up on POWERADE today!Â Â Available Sizes:Â 28 fl oz POWERADE ZERO STRAWBERRY SMASH has zero sugar and includes the taste of deliciously ripe, sweet strawberry flavors. It takes more grind to dominate, so stock up on POWERADE today!Â Â Available Sizes:Â 28 fl oz WATER, LESS THAN 0.5% OF: CITRIC ACID, ELECTROLYTES (SALT, SODIUM CITRATE, MAGNESIUM AND CALCIUM CHLORIDES, MONO-POTASSIUM PHOSPHATE), NATURAL FLAVORS, MODIFIED FOOD STARCH, SUCRALOSE, VITAMINS B12 AND C (CYANOCOBALAMIN AND ASCORBIC ACID), MEDIUM CHAIN TRIGLYCERIDES, SUCROSE ACETATE ISOBUTYRATE, ACESULFAME POTASSIUM, CALCIUM DISODIUM EDTA (TO PROTECT COLOR), RED 40.
